channel.title: Bioshock: Infinite
channel.description:
I just finished the game on Hard, that's why it took me a bit longer than everyone else. This will probably be my favorite game of 2013, a version of a ending was kind of hinted at throughout the game but I was suprised with the true ending. Overall I'd give it a 9/10.
Discuss.

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

I’ve never heard of it. o_o
But I must say that it looks awesome,
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B3UJgHUUNDA[/youtube]

Read full topic

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:2, topic:513993”]Yes, I thought of the game to be VERY interesting. I skipped the first one, and did two and this one, I downloaded the first one and started playing it now.

Anyway, I loved the ending, it was mind blowing! I didn’t expect it but came across some of the points and could never figure out what the ending was until I FINALLY got there - it was awesome.[/quote]I read a few blog posts that kind of explained the rifts a bit more, it made more sense after that. They kind of explained it poorly in the game but I guessing they did that just to get people thinking and using the imaginations to what the rifts were and what they meant. It should be Game of the Year 2013, or if not within the top 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Bioshock: Infinite
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Yes, I thought of the game to be VERY interesting. I skipped the first one, and did two and this one, I downloaded the first one and started playing it now.

Anyway, I loved the ending, it was mind blowing! I didn’t expect it but came across some of the points and could never figure out what the ending was until I FINALLY got there - it was awesome.

Read full topic
